Squid Proxy server with multiple IPs or proxy
item.description: My dear readers. I am here again for your help with squid proxy server. I will show you today how to use squid server to work with several IP in a vps/system. This is very useful if you do Craigslist work or something like that. Proxy is interesting. Squid proxy is like a Swiss Army … Continue reading Squid proxy Server with multiple IP

item.title: Solve Google,Facebook etc site Loading Problem in Squid Proxy
item.dc:creator: Fahad Ahammed
item.category: google not loading by squid proxy server
How to solve squid IPV6 problem
item.description: If you see that your newly created Squid proxy server can’t access Google, Facebook and other sites then you are right place to get the solution. Actually this problem arises when your ISP have no IPV6 for you. And Google,Facebook type giant sites has IPV6. So Squid just route you to access by IPV6 whether … Continue reading Solve Google,Facebook etc site Loading Problem in Squid Proxy

item.description: We can limit the download/upload limit for particular user/ip range/time . This will help to not to create high load in the server during ofice time or some particular time or maybe some users . To limit for all :   reply_body_max_size 30 MB   User or User group based download and upload limit : … Continue reading Squid Proxy Server Download/Upload Limit

item.title: Squid Proxy Server Working or Not ?
item.dc:creator: Fahad Ahammed
item.category: bann domain access in squid proxy server
squid proxy server with user and password
item.description: If you have completed your installation of squid proxy server then you can see how your proxy server working and how it is handling caching or contents . It is important to know whether squid server caching or not. tail -f /var/log/squid3/access.log Above command will monitor all incoming request and log them to /var/log/squid3/access_log file. … Continue reading Squid Proxy Server Working or Not ?

item.title: Installing Squid Proxy Server in Ubuntu
item.dc:creator: Fahad Ahammed
item.category: ban domain access in squid proxy server
squid proxy server with user and password
item.description: Log in on Ubuntu Server, then type command below to Install squid : sudo apt-get install squid3 ccze Create directory for Cache, on this case cache directory placed on directory /home/precise/cache/. Then change the permissions cache directory to 777 and owner proxy:proxy sudo mkdir -p /home/precise/cache/ sudo chmod 777 /home/precise/cache/ sudo chown proxy:proxy /home/precise/cache/ Before … Continue reading Installing Squid Proxy Server in Ubuntu
